name: INAirportGate
desc: The information that describes an arrival or departure gate for a flight.

items.name: init(airport: INAirport, terminal: String?, gate: String?)
items.desc: Creates a new gate object for a flight.

items.name: var airport: INAirport
items.desc: The airport from which a flight departs or arrives.

items.name: var terminal: String?
items.desc: The terminal from which a flight departs or arrives.
